Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:E. coli (MIC>100 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:S. aureus (MIC=3 µM).Yeast:C. albicans (MIC=3 µM).
Sequence Information.Function: Inhibits the growth of reference strains of S. aureus, E. coli and C. albicans and to lyse human erythrocytes from a healthy donor and HepG2 human hepatoma-derived cells

Literature.Title: Purification of peptides with differential cytolytic activities from the skin secretions of the Central American frog, Lithobates vaillanti (Ranidae).
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2009 Aug;150(2)150-154.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Raza H, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Leprince J, Vaudry H, King JD.
